title: How to tell if Democrats held the House in 2022? Watch these six races
description: Have the Democrats turned things around this midterm cycle — thanks to the Supreme Court's decision to overturn Roe v. Wade and former President Donald Trump’s constant presence in the news. Josh Kraushaar, Senior political correspondent at Axios, and Ally Mutnick, Politico reporter covering House campaigns and redistricting, join Chuck to talk about the House races.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
